name: raoctober day 2 - "skeleton"
description:
I, Zinfandel,  have created  this very, very short experience as an  entry for day 2 of raoctober, following the day's theme, "skeleton". I hope you enjoy  it.

The up and down arrow keys navigate dialog boxes.  Enter or Escape close dialog boxes.

Press P at the game's title screen to play,  then use the arrow  keys to move your player around and walk into things to interact with them.

In this game, you can also press T to light up the dark as long as  you have torches.
